justification: The proposal focuses on Team A’s needs and ignores Team B’s conservative, floor-first preferences. Asking for Austin Torres (ascending, friendly schedule) in exchange for Jordan King (committee, declining role, tough playoffs) likely reduces B’s weekly stability. B already rosters volatile committee RBs; adding another doesn’t fit their beliefs. The offer is feasible roster-wise (A trades RB depth for WR), but the rationale is generic and lacks evidence about B’s incentives or rankings.
